title: Never have I ever, league edition!
body:
Say something you have never done, and if you read something that you HAVE done, upvote it.
 ( take a shot too if you are allowed by your countries drinking laws, i do not condone underage drinking, im not even sure if i need this disclaimer tbh)


Never have I ever intentionally stolen someones penta because they were annoying or toxic.

replies.body: Never have I ever died for a ward. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Ward #318 found k6 vayne and braum waiting in a bush. 3k in less than 3 seconds.
Never have I chased Singed.

I have done most of these things, and some are kinda bad, but here is mine:

Never Have I ever: 
Intentionally built two or more of one item.
Never have I ever tried to repeatedly murder the adc

Never have I ever complained about Yasuo and called him a garbage brainless champ.

:^)
Never have I ever failed an over-the-wall flash.
Never have I ever bought a legendary skin
Never have I ever warded after being ganked
Never have I ever: Played Aatrox, Warwick or Malphite.
Never have I ever bought a skin less than 975 RP.
Never have I ever blamed my jungler also I'm a top main.
I'm a jungle main and even I blame the jungler
Never have I ever Suicided and given shut down gold just to kill the enemy support.
Never have I ever thought Teemo was a broken/annoying champ
never have i ever failed to press the r button as soraka the moment i see someones health go down(it's turned into a habit)
Never have I ever played Teemo.
Never have I ever flashed a rank 7 mastery when I made a huge mistake or dying after going in 1v5 intentionally.
Never have I ever played Urgot in any mode other than ARAM.
Never have I ever used the Anivia wall, Trundle Pillar, Taliyah Ult (and I think Yorick's circle) to cancel my teammate's backs.
Never have I ever picked a support other than Taric after my ADC locks in Ezreal.
never have i ever played a champ for the first time in ranked.
Never have I ever met a nice Vayne.
Never have I ever won or lost a close game. It is always a stomp one way or the other.

Never have I ever:
Banned Zed
I swear on Harambe's grave
He was never really _THAT_ strong
Harambe's grave? He was never buried. If you don't believe me play Overwatch and see for yourself.
never have i ever intentionally fed
Never have I ever trolled my team so hard the enemy team gave up.

Never have I ever gotten to Diamond.

...
Never have I ever flamed team mates/ opponents ( I just think terrible things about them).
Never have I ever gone AFK because I had to pee.
Never have I ever purchased a champion and not play them in the support role at least once.
Never have I ever whined about Yasuo on the boards.

Another one could be: Never have I ever whined about people on the boards whining about Yasuo.

Because I'm guilty of that 100%.

Srsly guys he's one of the champions that I can actually play against when I mid.
Never have I ever spammed my mastery as lee sin after killing somebody
This Just in:  teenagers around the world running naked in the streets. alcohol is suspected to have been a factor.
Never ever have I ever won against bots =(
Never have I ever gotten a chat restriction for flaming.
Never have I complained about having to support in champion select.

Never have I ever gotten Elder Dragon .__.
(In my defense, not many of the games I've played lasted long enough to get it)
never have i ever been in bronze
Never have I ever successfully played Nidalee.
Never have I ever built {{item:3145}}  without intending to build it into something.
Never have I ever intentionally fed.
Never have I ever played lee sin

Never have I ever question mark pinged someone because they failed at something.


Thats just fucking toxic.
Never have I ever flamed a teammate for stealing a kill.
Never have I ever, thought Vayne should be able to burst.

Never have I ever gotten a penta with {{champion:30}} 
{{item:3070}}
